channel.title: Personal on The Cloud Cowboy
channel.description: Recent content in Personal on The Cloud Cowboy

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi, I’m Chris, the Cloud Cowboy. By day I’m a Cloud infrastructure architect, with a focus on security, governance and automation. By night… I’m well I guess I’m still that, just more tired. I work mostly in the Azure cloud. I do some work in AWS, and have certifications in both clouds, but I greatly prefer Azure. My team and I focus on developing guardrails and security controls for our developer community to prevent them from making any big mistakes, and to automatically fix problems where we can.
